column4: when ubuntu doesn't recognize a wireless card at all (not listing it in lspci or lshw) what does that mean?
It should show up on the pci buss then.  Does it work under Windows?
Then it almost *has* to show up with lspci -v
First time I've ever seen that then.  Congrats! :-)
You don't suppose they did something stupid like hang it on the USB bus via an internal header or something?  lsusb -v  (I don't hold much hope for that.)
in case I'm missing something http://paste.ubuntu.com/191378/
Yeah, I don't see it either.
Yeah, not there either.  Bummer dude!
yeah I'm not giving up though
